description: A resistance group based in northern Africa, in modern-day Libya, which fights against the http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] forces who have effectively taken control of the http://anidb.net/ch1603 [African Community]. The group is led by the grizzled guerilla fighter http://anidb.net/ch1700 [Sahib Ashman], and its members are recruited from local towns like Tassil and Moula, as well as the city of Banadiya.
name: Ake no Sabaku
